column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°155 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5061.1816 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5173.2422 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 163.4766 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 7.9102 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 382.3242 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1547.7539 mm³, the right putamen of volume 406.0547 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 72.5098 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 259.7168 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 114.6973 mm³, the right ventral diencephalon of volume 6.5918 mm³ and the right vessel of volume 11.8652 mm³.
